CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: High short - circuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and power conversion efficiency ( 2.71% ) were achieved , which is a significant advance for efficient photovoltaic polymers that respond to the whole range of the solar spectrum .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. High short - circuit current (Material Name: current)
2. Power conversion efficiency (Material Name: efficiency)
3. Photovoltaic polymers (Material Name: photovoltaic polymers)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. Photovoltaic polymers (Material Name: photovoltaic polymers)

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name":

* High (it is a quantity, not a material name)
* whole range (it is a phrase, not a material name)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| photovoltaic polymers |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: High short - circuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and power conversion efficiency ( 2.71% ) were achieved , which is a significant advance for efficient photovoltaic polymers that respond to the whole range of the solar spectrum .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Name" entities:

1. High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2)
2. Power conversion efficiency (2.71%)

These are the properties of the photovoltaic polymers being discussed in the paragraph, and they are being used to describe the performance of the materials.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities that refer to material properties in the paragraph:

1. High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2)
2. Power conversion efficiency (2.71%)

These are the material properties being discussed in the paragraph, as they relate to the performance of the photovoltaic polymers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2) |
| Power conversion efficiency (2.71%) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: High short - circuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and power conversion efficiency ( 2.71% ) were achieved , which is a significant advance for efficient photovoltaic polymers that respond to the whole range of the solar spectrum .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Value" entities:

1. High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2) - This is a measure of the electrical current that flows through a material when it is subjected to a short circuit.
2. Power conversion efficiency (2.71%) - This is a measure of the proportion of incoming solar energy that is converted into electrical energy by a solar cell or other photovoltaic device.

So, the two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2)
2. Power conversion efficiency (2.71%)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2) - This refers to the electrical conductivity of the material.
2. Power conversion efficiency (2.71%) - This refers to the ability of the material to convert sunlight into electrical energy.

So, the two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2)
2. Power conversion efficiency (2.71%)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| High short-circuit current (14.87 mA/cm^2) |
| Power conversion efficiency (2.71%) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
